column5: As an indian you have to be exceptionally goodlooking to standout or else you'll be invisible.

Same has happened to me and my parents are constantly worrying that i'm suicidal since i don't talk to them and sit in my room all day. I've just lost any hope for life and humanity, at this point i'm kinda just waiting to die.

Lol imagine settling in this day and age where casual sex is unrestricted and dating apps/social media are popularized. Trust and commitment are dying quick and we are already seeing a significant amount of young men stuck in celibacy (almost 30%)
Haven't existed for billions of years and it wasn't so bad

Meditation is the only time i feel at peace and connected with my surroundings, unfortunately modern life and society has deviated away from this ancient practice and tries to sell happiness in pointless consumerist shit.
